quotes.Author: Abraham Lincoln
quotes.Quote: Determine that the thing can and shall be done, and then we shall find the way.

quotes.Author: Abraham Lincoln
quotes.Quote: I am not bound to win, but I am bound to be true. I am not bound to succeed, but I am bound to live up to what light I have.

quotes.Author: Abraham Lincoln
quotes.Quote: Always bear in mind that your own resolution to success is more important than any other one thing.

quotes.Author: Albert Einstein
quotes.Quote: If at first an idea isnt absurd there is no hope for it.

quotes.Author: Albert Einstein
quotes.Quote: Imagination is more important than knowledge.

quotes.Author: Albert Einstein
quotes.Quote: In the middle of difficulty lies opportunity.

quotes.Author: Albert Einstein
quotes.Quote: There are only two ways to live your life. One is though nothing is a miracle. The other is though everything is a miracle.

quotes.Author: Alfred Armand Montapert
quotes.Quote: Reputation is what folks think you are. Personality is what you seem to be. Character is what you really are.

quotes.Author: Andre Gide
quotes.Quote: One doesnt discover new lands without consenting to lose sight of the shore for a very long time.

quotes.Author: Andrew Jackson
quotes.Quote: You must pay the price if you wish to secure the blessings.

quotes.Author: Anne Frank
quotes.Quote: How lovely to think that no one need wait a moment, we can start now, start slowly changing the world! How lovely that everyone, great and small, can make their contribution toward introducing justice straightaway And you can always, always give something, even if it is only kindness!

quotes.Author: Unknown
quotes.Quote: When everything seems like an uphill struggle, just think of the view from the top

quotes.Author: Unknown
quotes.Quote: Your altitude is determined by your attitude

quotes.Author: Unknown
quotes.Quote: Champions in any field have made a habit of doing what others find boring or uncomfortable

quotes.Author: Unknown
quotes.Quote: Those who follow the crowd are quickly lost in it.

quotes.Author: Unknown
quotes.Quote: What you become is more important than what you accomplish.

quotes.Author: Unknown
quotes.Quote: No individual raindrop considers itself responsible for the flood.

quotes.Author: Unknown
quotes.Quote: Worry is a think stream of fear which, if encouraged, becomes a wide channel into which all other thoughts flow. Assume an attitude of positive expectancy!

quotes.Author: Anton Chekhov
quotes.Quote: Man is what he believes.

quotes.Author: Armistead Maupin
quotes.Quote: But I will say that the drugs are much more ferocious then they used to be. There are people wrecking their lives with addiction, which seems much more severe.

quotes.Author: Ashley Montagu
quotes.Quote: The deepest human defeat suffered by human beings is constituted by the difference between what one was capable of becoming and what one has in fact become.

quotes.Author: Ayn Rand
quotes.Quote: The desire not to be anything is the desire not to be.

quotes.Author: Ayn Rand
quotes.Quote: No ones happiness but my own is in my power to achieve or to destroy.

quotes.Author: Ayn Rand
quotes.Quote: Happiness is that state of consciousness which proceeds from the achievement of ones values.

quotes.Author: Barnaby Keeney
quotes.Quote: No man or woman is uniformly successful we must all expect a rather high percentage of failure in the things we attempt.

quotes.Author: Beatrice Vincent
quotes.Quote: The people with whom you work reflect your own attitude. If you are suspicious, unfriendly and condescending, you will find these unlovely traits echoed all about you. But if you are on your best behavior, you will bring out the best in the persons with whom you are going to spend most of your working hours.

quotes.Author: Benjamin Franklin
quotes.Quote: Well done is better than well said.

quotes.Author: Bernard Edmonds
quotes.Quote: To trust yourself to test your limits. That is the courage to succeed.

quotes.Author: Bill Cosby
quotes.Quote: Decide that you want it more than you are afraid of it.

quotes.Author: Bishop Steere
quotes.Quote: Do not think that what your thoughts dwell on does not matter. Your thoughts are making you.

quotes.Author: Bishop W.C. Magee
quotes.Quote: The man who makes no mistakes does not usually make anything.

quotes.Author: Blaise Pascal
quotes.Quote: We must learn our limits. We are all something, but none of us are everything.

quotes.Author: Bob Conklin
quotes.Quote: Its not the situation its your reaction to the situation.

quotes.Author: Booker T. Washington
quotes.Quote: Success is to be measured not so much by the position that one has reached in life, as by the obstacles one has overcome trying to succeed.

quotes.Author: Christian Nestell Bovee
quotes.Quote: Our first and last love is  self-love.

quotes.Author: Brian Tracy
quotes.Quote: Move out of your comfort zone. You can only grow if you are willing to feel awkward and uncomfortable when you try something new.

quotes.Author: Bruce Barton
quotes.Quote: Sometimes when I consider what tremendous consequences come from little things I am tempted to think there are no little things.

quotes.Author: Bruce Lee
quotes.Quote: The less effort, the faster and more powerful you will be.

quotes.Author: Buddha
quotes.Quote: We are what we think.

quotes.Author: Carl Schurz
quotes.Quote: Ideals are like stars; you will not succeed in touching them with your hands, but like the seafaring man on the desert of waters, you choose them as your guides, and following them, you reach your destiny.

quotes.Author: Charles Buxton
quotes.Quote: Experience shows that success is due less to ability than to zeal. The winner is he who gives himself to his work, body and soul.

quotes.Author: Charles Darwin
quotes.Quote: A man who dares to waste one hour of life has not discovered the value of life.

quotes.Author: Charles du Bois
quotes.Quote: The important thing is this: To be able at any moment to sacrifice what we are for what we could become.

quotes.Author: Chinese Proverb
quotes.Quote: Better to light one small candle than to curse the darkness.

quotes.Author: Christine Frankland
quotes.Quote: Life is just a blank slate, what matters most is what you write on it.

quotes.Author: Christopher Lasch
quotes.Quote: Drugs are merely the most obvious form of addiction in our society. Drug addiction is one of the things that undermines traditional values.

quotes.Author: Christopher Morley
quotes.Quote: The big shots are only the little shots who keep shooting.

quotes.Author: Cicero
quotes.Quote: Natural ability without education has more often raised a man to glory and virtue than education without natural ability.

quotes.Author: Cicero
quotes.Quote: The proof of a well-trained mind is that it rejoices in which is good and grieves at the opposite.

quotes.Author: Claude M. Bristol
quotes.Quote: Its the constant and determined effort that breaks down all resistance, sweeps away all obstacles.

quotes.Author: Colin Powell
quotes.Quote: There are no secrets to success. It is the result of preparation, hard work, learning from failure.

quotes.Author: Confucius
quotes.Quote: The superior man is distressed by the limitations of his ability; he is not distressed by the fact that men do not recognize the ability that he has.

quotes.Author: Dale Carnegie
quotes.Quote: Did you ever see an unhappy horse? Did you ever see bird that had the blues? One reason why birds and horses are not unhappy is because they are not trying to impress other birds and horses.

quotes.Author: Dale Carnegie
quotes.Quote: Remember, today is the tomorrow you worried about yesterday.

quotes.Author: Dale Carnegie
quotes.Quote: Take a chance! All life is a chance. The man who goes the furthest is generally the one who is willing to do and dare.

quotes.Author: Dale Carnegie
quotes.Quote: People rarely succeed unless they have fun in what they are doing.

quotes.Author: Dale Carnegie
quotes.Quote: The successful man will profit from his mistakes and try again in a different way.

quotes.Author: David Seabury
quotes.Quote: Try out your ideas by visualizing them in action.

quotes.Author: Dennis Daley, PhD
quotes.Quote: Recovery from addiction requires hard work, a proper attitude and learning skills to stay sober, not drinking alcohol or using other drugs.  Successful drug recovery or alcohol recovery involves changing attitudes, acquiring knowledge, and developing skills to meet the many challenges of sobriety.

quotes.Author: Dr. Denis Waitley
quotes.Quote: The only limits on human achievement are self-imposed.

quotes.Author: Dr. Laurence J. Peter
quotes.Quote: There are two kinds of failures: those who thought and never did, and those who did and never thought.

quotes.Author: Dr. Martin Luther King, Jr.
quotes.Quote: The ultimate measure of a man is not where he stands in moments of comfort and convenience, but where he stands at times of challenge and controversy.

quotes.Author: Dwight D. Eisenhower
quotes.Quote: The older I get, the more wisdom I find in the ancient rule of taking first things first  a process which often reduces the most complex human problems to manageable proportions.

quotes.Author: Edmund Burke
quotes.Quote: He that wrestles with us strengthens our nerves and sharpens our skill. Our antagonist is our helper.

quotes.Author: Edward B. Butler
quotes.Quote: One man has enthusiasm for 30 minutes, another for 30 days, but it is the man who has it for 30 years who makes a success of his life.

quotes.Author: Elbert Green Hubbard
quotes.Quote: To avoid criticism, do nothing, say nothing, be nothing.

quotes.Author: Eleanor Roosevelt
quotes.Quote: No-one can make you feel inferior without your consent.

quotes.Author: Emile Coue
quotes.Quote: Every day, in every way, I am getting better and better.

quotes.Author: Emile Zola
quotes.Quote: The artist is nothing without the gift, but the gift is nothing without work.

quotes.Author: Emily Dickinson
quotes.Quote: The soul should always stand ajar, ready to welcome the ecstatic experience.

quotes.Author: Epicurus
quotes.Quote: Do not spoil what you have by desiring what you have not; but remember that what you have was once among the things only hoped for.

quotes.Author: Francis Bacon
quotes.Quote: Knowledge itself is power.

quotes.Author: Francis C. Kelley
quotes.Quote: Convictions are the mainsprings of action, the driving powers of life. What a man lives are his convictions.

quotes.Author: Frank Scully
quotes.Quote: Why not go out on a limb? Isnt that where the fruit is?
